channel.title: Hugo on Experimenting Hugo !
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Experimenting Hugo !

item.title: Asset concatenation and minification
item.description: I’ve added the elements such that CSS files will be concatenated and minified as well as post-processed (CSS purge).

item.title: The basic website
item.description: I started coding the website using Hugo! https://joncourbon.github.io/hugoexperimentation/ressources/2020-11-03-hugo/

item.title: Hugo !
item.description:
Hugo is a popular open-source static site generators. Its speed and flexibility are very interesting.

The main documentation for Hugo can be found on the website https://gohugo.io/
